info.guardianproject.netcipher.client

Class StrongConnectionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.guardianproject.netcipher.client.StrongBuilderBase<StrongConnectionBuilder,java.net.HttpURLConnection>
      • info.guardianproject.netcipher.client.StrongConnectionBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StrongBuilder<StrongConnectionBuilder,java.net.HttpURLConnection>

    public class StrongConnectionBuilder
extends StrongBuilderBase<StrongConnectionBuilder,java.net.HttpURLConnection>
    Builds an HttpUrlConnection that connects via Tor through Orbot.

                               java.net.HttpURLConnection connection,

        Description copied from class: StrongBuilderBase
        Performs an HTTP GET request using the supplied connection to a supplied URL, returning the String response or throws an Exception (e.g., cannot reach the server). This is used as part of validating the Tor connection.
